cases.title: Orthopedic Surgery Expert Witness Allowed to Testify on Procedures Not Used in His Practice
cases.description: Defendant's Orthopedic Surgery Expert Witness could testify regarding Radiofrequency Ablation Procedures despite not using them in his practice.

cases.title: Vocational Evaluation & Rehabilitation Expert Witness Testimony Allowed to Testify on PTSD Issues
cases.description: The court ruled a Vocational Evaluation & Rehabilitation Expert Witness could testify on whether PTSD would affect earning capacity.

cases.title: Construction Expert Witness Allowed to Testify Despite Relation to Plaintiff
cases.description: The U.S. District Court, Southern District of Georgia, allowed Plaintiff's Construction Expert Witness to testify regarding roof damage, even though he was Plaintiff's son, and had an interest in the property.
